title: .DS_Store issues with environments

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
I have some troubles using environments on MacOS as soon as .DS_Store exists. I know the problem was already reported, but is supposed to have been solved.

### Steps to reproduce the issue
I have a simple reproducer for the issue I am running into : 
 - On MacOs.
 - Clone Spack.
 - Use finder and "go to folder" to navigate the `spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages`, and try clicking some directory until a `.DS_Store` file is created.

Then the two following didn’t worked for me:
 - Try to concertize even the simpler external environment.
 - Create a new environment, activate it, and try to add a spec.

Both leads to:
```
==> Error: [Errno 20] Not a directory:
'/Users/bernede1/Tests/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/.DS_Store/package.py'
```

Spack is up-to-date and history contains the Christmas merge of #10198.
